TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The dishwasher loads you in and proceeds to wash you.

I wish I didn't have finals.

Granted. They were last week, and you failed them.

I wish Windows update integration would just work.

Granted. However, you are forced to use Windows Vista for all eternity.

I wish for a full set of encyclopedias.

Granted, it's a 1973 edition.

I wish for wikipedia to have peer-reviewed accuracy.

Granted, but all of the peer editors have the same wrong ideas.

I wish for a bigger backpack.

Granted. Your backpack is now huge and everyone now calls you a nerd because of it and you lose your friends.

I wish I didn't have a runny nose.

Granted. Your nose decided to take up olympic swimming instead of running

I wish to be able to give more rep to green iron crown without having to wait 24 hours.

Granted, but that rep ain't positive.

I wish people would get over this silly GIC business.

Granted they re now after a business they totally do not understand.

I wish my first natural reaction after a car crash with 3 family member not an 4hours series of yawns and "bad luck not this time" thoughs ...

Edited January 21, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
*shrug ... bored*

Granted. Your inability to convey the intended meaning of that wish results in:

Cars that you and your relatives own spontaneously crash into thin air whenever you're bored.

I wish for the planet to be bombarded by car-sized invisible spheres.

Granted. But you haven't even seen it coming...

I wish that I'm the world's greatest robotics engineer.

Granted. You advance A.I. to the point where the robots you create turn sentient and before long... The Terminator movies become real.

I wish I was in space right now.

Granted. Your body freezes up and you die as you have nothing to protect you with. (easy)

I wish that my wish is not corrupted. I wish for it to be not messed with.

Granted. This reply kills the thread and no more wishes are granted.

I wish for a butler.

Granted. He is a BUTler. He is then arrested for public nudity as he picks up the paper in the mailbox. Aswell as you.

I wish that this thread is moved to the fan works section.

Granted, but he is extremely overbearing and intent on keeping everything clean around you, and disrupts your activities with his work.

I wish for a snack.

granted, enjoy your complimentary dog biscuit.

I wish I could space for real.

Granted, you are now officially permitted to press space bar whenever you want.

I wish I was able to see the night sky on the planet somewhere in the center of Galaxy.

Granted, but the planet is much more massive than the Earth, and the hypergravity adheres you to the surface of the planet, forcing you to look at the night sky until you eventually perish...

I wish my imagination was a tad less scary sometimes.

Granted. It is now so un-scary that you are no longer used to anything scary at all and are from now on afraid of almost everything, including most kinds of food, sunshine and your own shadow.

I wish my imagination was a tad more scary sometimes.

Granted. Oh, did you say a "tad" more scary? Oops.

-source xkcd: alttext, "I couldn't answer if the pain was two or more because it would mean a pause in the screaming."

I wish people would stop making meta wishes.

Edited January 22, 2015 by Norpo
rephrasing

Granted. They don't stop meta-wishes when they wish to real genies outside of forum games.

I wish for holograms.

windows 10

I wish for kerbals to land and nobody to die ss a result (land on eadthearth )

Granted. They parachute into the ocean and are categorized as meteors. The kerbal space program classifies Earth as an Ultra-Eve planet.

I wish for gps to work in every game.

Granted. Every enemy tracks your motion and location, and you instantaniasely die when you start up the game.

I wish for a Shiny Tropius.
